featured.title: Stranger Things
featured.overview: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

movies.title: The Crown
movies.overview: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

movies.title: Ozark
movies.overview: A financial advisor drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder $500 million to appease a Mexican cartel.

movies.title: The Witcher
movies.overview: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

movies.title: Bridgerton
movies.overview: Wealth, lust, and betrayal set in the backdrop of Regency era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

movies.title: Money Heist
movies.overview: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.

movies.title: Dark
movies.overview: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

movies.title: Mindhunter
movies.overview: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

movies.title: The Queen's Gambit
movies.overview: Orphaned at the tender age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess in 1960s USA.

movies.title: Russian Doll
movies.overview: Nadia keeps dying and reliving her 36th birthday party. She's trapped in a surreal time loop -- and staring down the barrel of her own mortality.

movies.title: Orange Is the New Black
movies.overview: Piper Chapman is a public relations executive with a career and a fiance when her past suddenly catches up to her.

movies.title: Breaking Bad
movies.overview: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

movies.title: The Office
movies.overview: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

movies.title: Friends
movies.overview: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

movies.title: The Sopranos
movies.overview: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state.

movies.title: Game of Thrones
movies.overview: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

movies.title: Extraction
movies.overview: Tyler Rake, a fearless black market mercenary, embarks on the most deadly extraction of his career when he's enlisted to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

movies.title: 6 Underground
movies.overview: Six individuals from all around the globe, each the very best at what they do, have been chosen not only for their skills, but for a unique desire to delete their pasts to change the future.

movies.title: The Old Guard
movies.overview: A covert team of immortal mercenaries are suddenly exposed and must now fight to keep their identity a secret just when an unexpected new member is discovered.

movies.title: Project Power
movies.overview: On the streets of New Orleans, word begins to spread about a mysterious new pill that unlocks superpowers unique to each user.

movies.title: Bright
movies.overview: In an alternate present day, humans, orcs, elves and fairies have been co-existing since the beginning of time.

movies.title: Dead to Me
movies.overview: A series about a powerful friendship that blossoms between a tightly wound widow and a free spirit with a shocking secret.

movies.title: The Good Place
movies.overview: Four people and their otherworldly frienemy struggle in the afterlife to define what it means to be good.

movies.title: Schitt's Creek
movies.overview: After being a victim of fraud, Johnny Rose and his family go from extremely wealthy to penniless overnight.

movies.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
movies.overview: Comedy series following the exploits of Det. Jake Peralta and his diverse, lovable colleagues as they police the NYPD's 99th Precinct.

movies.title: The Umbrella Academy
movies.overview: On one day in 1989, forty-three infants are inexplicably born to random, unconnected women who showed no signs of pregnancy the day before.
